        public java.lang.String getAsString(org.snmp4j.smi.OID oid)
                             throws SNMPTimeOutException,
                                    PDURequestFailedException,
                                    OIDDoesNotExistsException
        The method getAsString(Oid oid) is using the @see SnmpManager#get to get a String value of the specified OID.
        Specified by:
        getAsString in interface SnmpManager
        Parameters:
        oid - the requested OID
        Returns:
        a String with the result from the specified OID
        Throws:
        SNMPTimeOutException - will be thrown if a timeout with request happens
        PDURequestFailedException - will be thrown if an error occurs within the request
        OIDDoesNotExistsException

      • get

        public java.util.Vector<? extends org.snmp4j.smi.VariableBinding> get(org.snmp4j.smi.OID[] oids)
                                                               throws SNMPTimeOutException,
                                                                      PDURequestFailedException
        The method get can be specified with an Array of requested OIDs. A Vector with elements of the subclass VariableBinding will be returned. OID requested from the method GET can only return a value. Therefore the OIDd must be a scalar and not a branch.
        Specified by:
        get in interface SnmpManager
        Parameters:
        oids - the requested OIDs
        Returns:
        A Vector with VariableBindings
        Throws:
        SNMPTimeOutException - will be thrown if a timeout with request happens
        PDURequestFailedException - will be thrown if an error occurs within the request
        See Also:
        VariableBinding

      • createPDU

        public org.snmp4j.PDU createPDU(int type,
                                org.snmp4j.smi.OID[] oids)
        This method creates the requst and puts it in an PDU object. This object will be returnd and used from Methods such as get,walk and getnext.
        Specified by:
        createPDU in interface SnmpManager
        Parameters:
        type - - the type of the response, possible are PDU.GET,PDU.GETNEXT, PDU.GETBULK
        oids - - the requested OIDs
        Returns:
        - the request PDU
        See Also:
        PDU

      • checkResponsePDU

        public boolean checkResponsePDU(org.snmp4j.PDU responsePDU)
                         throws PDURequestFailedException,
                                SNMPTimeOutException
        This method returns true or false, which depend on the response PDU. If the response PDU is not null and don't have an error, true will be returned.
        Specified by:
        checkResponsePDU in interface SnmpManager
        Parameters:
        responsePDU - the responsePDU, which will be checked for errors.
        Returns:
        - true if no error was invoked else false.
        Throws:
        PDURequestFailedException - - If an error occurred in the response PDU.
        SNMPTimeOutException - - If a timeout occured
        See Also:
        PDU

                                                          throws TreeEventException

        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • start

        public void start()
           throws java.io.IOException
        This method has to be invoked before sending the message. It listens for incoming messages.
        Specified by:
        start in interface SnmpManager
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - if an IO operation exception occurs while starting the listener.

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Stops the thread, which is listening for the incoming messages and releases all bound resources synchronously.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface SnmpManager
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - if any IO operation for the close fails.
